metadata.name: White House Chaos
metadata.description: You're a senior advisor to an unpredictable US President. Navigate the chaotic political environment while trying to implement policy and manage crises.

scenario: Political Chaos in the White House
startingPoint: It's your first week as a senior advisor to the President. A controversial tweet has just gone viral, foreign leaders are demanding clarification, and the press is hammering the communications team. The Chief of Staff has summoned you to a crisis meeting.

policy_analysis.name: Policy Analysis
policy_analysis.description: Provide expert insight on policy implications

diplomatic_negotiation.name: Diplomatic Negotiation
diplomatic_negotiation.description: Smooth tensions with foreign or domestic officials

whistle_blowing.name: Whistle Blowing
whistle_blowing.description: Report unethical behavior through proper channels

background.name: Professional Background
background.description: What was your career before this role?

motivation.name: Personal Motivation
motivation.description: Why did you take this job?

administration.name: President
administration.description: Impulsive, media-obsessed, and unpredictable, but with remarkable political instincts.

administration.name: Chief of Staff
administration.description: Practical, overworked, and trying to maintain some semblance of order.

administration.name: Communications Director
administration.description: Constantly in damage control mode with a strained relationship with the press.

external.name: Press Corps
external.description: Eager for stories and constantly challenging the administration's narrative.

external.name: Opposition Leader
external.description: Looking for any opportunity to criticize the administration.
